mapper.select: SELECT d.dSerialNumber, m.mClass, s.location, s.sName, e.userName, e.rank, d.dAmount, d.dDate FROM Disposal d INNER JOIN SubClass s ON d.scSerialNumber = s.scSerialNumber INNER JOIN Employee e ON d.userid = e.userid INNER JOIN MainClass m ON s.mcSerialNumber = m.mcSerialNumber

SELECT d.dSerialNumber, m.mClass, s.location, s.sName, e.userName, e.rank, d.dAmount, d.dDate FROM Disposal d INNER JOIN SubClass s ON d.scSerialNumber = s.scSerialNumber INNER JOIN Employee e ON d.userid = e.userid INNER JOIN MainClass m ON s.mcSerialNumber = m.mcSerialNumber WHERE dDate = #{dDate}

SELECT m.mClass, s.location, s.sName, sum(d.dAmount) As dAmount FROM Disposal d INNER JOIN SubClass s ON d.scSerialNumber = s.scSerialNumber INNER JOIN MainClass m ON s.mcSerialNumber = m.mcSerialNumber WHERE dDate = #{dDate} GROUP BY m.mClass,s.location,s.sName
